mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dict_items ( dict_id, label, value, value_type, status, sort, tag_color, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{dictId}, #{label}, #{value}, #{valueType}, #{status}, #{sort}, #{tagColor}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
